name: GetIssuesList
description:
Retrieve a list of issues.

Call this tool to get a list of issues from the Pylon service, useful for tracking or managing tasks and bugs.

parameters.name: start_time_for_issue_range
parameters.description: The start time in RFC3339 format to query issues. Duration with end_time must be <= 30 days.

value_schema.description: The start time (RFC3339) of the time range to get issues for. The duration between start_time and end_time must be less than or equal to 30 days.

parameters.name: end_time_rfc3339
parameters.description: The end time in RFC3339 format for the issue retrieval range, must be within 30 days of the start time.

value_schema.description: The end time (RFC3339) of the time range to get issues for. The duration between start_time and end_time must be less than or equal to 30 days.
